The Singing Flower: In a world where music is the only form of magic, a young girl named Aria discovers she has the rare ability to sing flowers into existence. As she learns to control her power, she becomes the most sought-after gardener in the kingdom, but her unique talent also attracts the attention of a powerful sorcerer who seeks to exploit her abilities for his own gain. Aria must learn to harness her power and protect herself from those who would misuse it.

The Singing Flower: In a world where flowers are the only form of life, a young flower named Melody discovers she has the rare ability to sing. As she learns to control her power, she becomes the most celebrated flower in the garden, but her fame comes with a price. A jealous weed named Thistle plots to destroy her and take her place as the most beloved flower in the garden. Melody must learn to overcome her fears and trust in her own voice to save herself and the garden from destruction.
